snippet: A man identifying himself as the deputy oil minister, Abdo Hussameldin, appeared in a video posted to YouTube on Wednesday and said he had left his post.
abstract: Abdu Hussameldin, a senior official in Syria’s Oil Ministry, announces in a video statement that he is switching to the opposition and denounces the brutal government of Pres Bashar al-Assad, in what appears to be the highest-level defection of a government official since the start of the Syrian uprising in early 2011.

byline.original: By KAREEM FAHIM and RICK GLADSTONE
byline.contributor: Kareem Fahim reported from Beirut, and Rick Gladstone from New York. Hwaida Saad contributed reporting from Beirut, and J. David Goodman from New York.
